text: læa brrda phu thi di tang hlakhælng xyu thi nkhr ma di nah.(Chaw xan sxr)læa phwk khea sraththa kxn hna kar xphyph khxng phwk khea(chaw mu ha yi rin)phwk khea rak khır phu thi xphyph mayang phwk khea læa ca mi phb khwam txngkar hrux khwam xiccha xyu nı thrwngxk khxng phwk khea nı sing thi di thuk prathan hı læa hı siththi phu xun kxn taw khxng phwk khea xeng thung mæwa phwk khea yang mi khwam txngkar xyu mak ktam læa phu dı pkpxng kar trahni thi xyu nı taw khxng khea chn hela nan phwk khea pen phu prasb khwam sarec
